An Investment in our future

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#0a86a8″ text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]The ADIBOT system provides a safe way to help businesses, organizations, and schools open safely by inactivating harmful pathogens in areas where people need and want to be without the use of harmful chemicals or costly downtimes.
